== Introduction ==

We are preparing Ubuntu MATE Yakkety Yak (16.10) for distribution on  <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.org/YakketyYak/ReleaseSchedule | October 13th, 2016]]</nowiki>. With this '''Beta 1''' pre-release, you can see what we are trying out in preparation for our next (stable) version.

'''NOTE:''' 

This is Beta 1 Release. 
Ubuntu MATE '''Beta Releases''' are '''NOT''' recommended for:
* Regular users who are not aware of pre-release issues
* Anyone who needs a stable system
* Anyone uncomfortable running a possibly frequently broken system
* Anyone in a production environment with data or workflows that need to be reliable

Ubuntu MATE Beta Releases are recommended for:
* Regular users who want to help us test by finding, reporting, and/or fixing bugs
* Ubuntu MATE, MATE, and GTK+ developers

== Ubuntu MATE 16.10 Beta 1 Release Notes ==

When Ubuntu MATE 16.10 Beta 1 is released you'll be able to access the release notes from:

** https://ubuntu-mate.org/blog/ubuntu-mate-yakkety-beta1/

== Getting Ubuntu MATE 16.10 Beta 1 ==

When Ubuntu MATE 16.10 Beta 1 is released you'll be able to access the downloads via:

** https://ubuntu-mate.org/download/
